title: Open Stages 2025: Park Slope Stoop Concerts
perks: Outdoor live music on stoops, family-friendly
description: 30+ artists perform live on stoops and sidewalks across Park Slope in this beloved community music event.
aiSummary: Free stoop concerts across Park Slope. Over 30 artists bring music to the streets for a relaxed Brooklyn afternoon.
studioNotes: Wander with a stereo field recorder. Capture mic-to-doorframe resonance, children’s play noise, and street transitions.
